entry.title: Standing Desk
entry.content:
Continuing trends in building my own furniture and trying to be more healthy I’ve built my own standing desk.

I rounded the corners so I don’t gouge myself. Even painted it with polyureathene so it should survive the horrors of coffee mugs.

entry.title: Our Very Own Little HackSpace
entry.content:
We’ve manged to make some space in our house, and I needed to take a day off work. Thanks to the folks at Rona who pre-cut the surface plywood for me, I succeeded in measuring, cutting, and putting it all together inside a day.

It even looks like the picture, and only needed a little shimming under one leg.

entry.title: Loft
entry.content:
My 6 year old has to share a room with his 2 year old brother- who'se fingers are notourious for going everywhere by themselves.

What to do?

Create his own private loft.

My iPad and Adobe sketch were very helpful in both figuring it out and convincing other family members that it would work out.
